entries.title: The world’s first fully wireless OLED TV is completely off the hook
entries.description: Displace TV's CES 2023 debut shows that wire-free TV isn't just possible, but is now ready and waiting to be vacuum-sealed to your wall.

entries.title: It looks like we might never get an iPhone SE 4 from Apple
entries.description: Low sales numbers and a poorly performing 5G chip could be the reason why Apple has shelved plans for another iPhone SE.

entries.title: The Samsung Galaxy S23 launch date just got confirmed by Samsung itself
entries.description: It looks very much as though the next Unpacked event from Samsung will be held on February 1.

entries.title: Microsoft scraps unpopular change to Windows 11 Start menu
entries.description: Another controversial change has also been ditched – but when will Microsoft learn its lesson about not pushing Edge?

entries.title: Lightyear reveals new $40,000 solar-powered car, claims it will sell in 2025
entries.description: After successfully building a concept, Lightyear reveals plans for a production solar-powered car -- at a killer price
